_header: Before time that good angel wrought / But God him self
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ cycle, see 1322.
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle ; Fall of the Angels and the Creation of Man
Subjects: angels, fall of; man, creation of
_description: The Fall of the Angels and the Creation of Man, in Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodAsh42.First Lines:
þis man þat had a hondrethe schepeEs criste þat to
                    mankynde takes kepe…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Ihesu criste till vs grace sendeþidir to come wiþ
                    him to lende
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
BI fore þe tyme þat god Angel wrouhtWas no þing but
                    God þat us bouht…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Wher Ioye and Murþe schal spredeAnd euere lyf and neuer
                    dede. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Bifore þe tyme þat god aungel wroghtWas god him self and
                    elles noght…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Nowe ihesu for þi mercy vs spedeTo do penaunce &
                    þidere vs lede

CULDd11.First Lines:
Beforn þe tyme þat god aungil wrouhteWas no þing but
                    god þat vs bouhte…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…And þat we may theder wendeSey we alle Amen at þis
                    ende

CULGg531.First Lines:
Be fore tyme þat god aungell wroghtBot god hym selfe þer
                    was ryght noght…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Ihesu cryste swylk grace vs sendþider to come euer
                    þare to lend

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
BIfore þe tyme þat god Angel wrouhtWas no þing but
                    god þat vs bouht…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Where Ioye & Mirthe schal spredeAnd euewr lyf and neuer
                    dede. Amen
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Befor þat gode aungel hade wroȝteBot god hym selfe
                    þat was riȝt noȝte…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Ihesu crist tall vs grace sendeThidir to come with hym to
                    lende

BLHar2391.First Lines: Be for þat god angell had wroghtbot gode hym selff þer was right noght…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Crist to vs þat grace sendeȝedir to cum with hym to lende
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica iii (left margin, f. 196) with “A tale” written above

HunHM129.First Lines:
Byfor þe tyme þat crist angell wroghtWos no þynge
                    bot god and noght…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Ihesu forthy mercy vs spedeto do penauns and þyddyr vs
                    lede
HunHM129.Note:
No heading or other indication of new text at beginning (except that
                    begins a new page), so treated as continuation of 6048
